original_text: And there shall be no man in the tabernacle of the congregation when he goeth in to make an atonement in the holy place, until he come out, and have made an atonement for himself, and for his household, and for all the congregation of Israel.
korean_text: 그가 지성소에 속죄하러 들어가서 자기와 그의 집안과 이스라엘 온 회중을 위하여 속죄하고 나오기까지는 누구든지 회막에 있지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: And there shall be no man in the tabernacle of the congregation
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 회막 안에 아무도 없어야 하며

sentences.original_text: when he goeth in to make an atonement in the holy place
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 거룩한 곳에 속죄하러 들어갈 때

sentences.original_text: and have made an atonement for himself
and for all the congregation of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 모든 회중을 위하여 속죄해야 하리라
